articles.author: Eddie Pells
articles.title: Incredible Raven: Saunders lends her voice to the Olympics - Associated Press
articles.description: TOKYO (AP) — The “Incredible Hulk” mask should not fool anybody. Raven Saunders has nothing to hide. The face, and the voice, of the Tokyo Olympics, and all they're about, could very well be found in a 25-year-old American shot putter who, on Sunday, could be…
articles.content:
TOKYO (AP) The Incredible Hulk mask should not fool anybody. Raven Saunders has nothing to hide.

articles.title: U.S. navy says drone strike hit oil tanker off Oman, killing 2, as Israeli officials blame Iran - CBC.ca
articles.description: U.S. navy explosive experts believe a "drone strike" targeted an oil tanker that came under attack off the coast of Oman in the Arabian Sea, killing two on board, the American military said Saturday.
articles.content: U.S. navy explosive experts believe a "drone strike" targeted an oil tanker that came under attack off the coast of Oman in the Arabian Sea, killing two on board, the American military said Saturday.… [+5031 chars]

articles.author: DAVID LEE
articles.title: Olympics: US swim star Caeleb Dressel ends Tokyo 2020 with five golds - The Straits Times
articles.description: America finish top of the meet with 11 titles, two clear of second-place Australia.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: TOKYO - American Caeleb Dressel has lived up to great expectations by leading his country to gold in the Olympics men's 4x100m medley relay in a new world world of 3min 26.78sec on Sunday (Aug 1) and… [+998 chars]

articles.author: CNN, Christina Maxouris
articles.title: Some vaccinated Americans have lost their patience with those refusing the shot as COVID-19 cases surge and mandates return - CTV News
articles.description: As COVID-19 cases and hospitalizations surge once again, officials across the U.S. are reimposing restrictions after a summer of semi normalcy, causing many vaccinated Americans to become increasingly angry at those who are refusing the shot.
articles.content:
